Models.Process:
[Model baseline] SystemVersion: 1.16
#1 [Process ReadProcessData] Function: ReadProcessData RespondInGUI: true #Output: ProcessData
#2 [Process ReadStrata] Function: ReadStrata RespondInGUI: true Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=FileName, Value=${STOX}/polygon/herring_spawning2015.txt Parameter: Name=UseProcessData, Value=false #Output: ProcessData
#3 [Process StratumArea] Function: StratumArea FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=AreaMethod, Value=Accurate #Output: PolygonArea
#4 [Process ReadAcousticXML] Function: ReadAcousticXML FileOutput: false Parameter: Name=FileName1, Value=input/acoustic/ListUserFile20__IngerHildur_NoiseCorr.txt Parameter: Name=FileName2, Value=input/acoustic/ListUserFile20__Ligrunn.txt Parameter: Name=FileName3, Value=input/acoustic/ListUserFile20__Nybo.txt Parameter: Name=FileName4, Value= Parameter: Name=FileName5, Value= Parameter: Name=FileName6, Value= #Output: AcousticData
#5 [Process FilterAcoustic] Function: FilterAcoustic RespondInGUI: true FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=AcousticData, Value=Process(ReadAcousticXML) Parameter: Name=DistanceExpr, Value= Parameter: Name=FreqExpr, Value=frequency eq 38000 && transceiver eq 1 Parameter: Name=NASCExpr, Value=acocat eq 12 && chtype eq 'P' #Output: AcousticData
#6 [Process DefineTransect] Function: DefineTransect RespondInGUI: true Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=AcousticData, Value=Process(FilterAcoustic) Parameter: Name=UseProcessData, Value=true #Output: ProcessData
#7 [Process NASC] Function: NASC FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=AcousticData, Value=Process(FilterAcoustic) Parameter: Name=LayerType, Value=WaterColumn #Output: NASC
#8 [Process MeanSAstratum] Function: MeanNASC FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=NASC, Value=Process(NASC) Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=SampleUnitType, Value=Stratum #Output: NASC
#9 [Process MeanNASC] Function: MeanNASC FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=NASC, Value=Process(NASC) Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=SampleUnitType, Value=PSU #Output: NASC
#10 [Process ReadBioticXML] Function: ReadBioticXML FileOutput: false Parameter: Name=FileName1, Value=input/biotic/Biotic-INGERH.xml Parameter: Name=FileName2, Value=input/biotic/Biotic-NYBO2015.xml Parameter: Name=FileName3, Value= Parameter: Name=FileName4, Value= Parameter: Name=FileName5, Value= Parameter: Name=FileName6, Value= #Output: BioticData
#11 [Process FilterBiotic] Function: FilterBiotic RespondInGUI: true FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=BioticData, Value=Process(ReadBioticXML) Parameter: Name=FishStationExpr, Value= Parameter: Name=CatchExpr, Value=species eq 'SILDG03' Parameter: Name=SampleExpr, Value= Parameter: Name=IndExpr, Value= #Output: BioticData
#12 [Process StationLengthDist] Function: StationLengthDist FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=BioticData, Value=Process(FilterBiotic) Parameter: Name=LengthDistType, Value=PercentLengthDist #Output: LengthDist
#13 [Process RegroupLengthDist] Function: RegroupLengthDist FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=LengthDist, Value=Process(StationLengthDist) Parameter: Name=LengthInterval, Value=1 #Output: LengthDist
#14 [Process BioStationAssignment] Function: BioStationAssignment RespondInGUI: true BreakInGUI: true Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=BioticData, Value=Process(FilterBiotic) Parameter: Name=AssignmentMethod, Value=UseProcessData Parameter: Name=AcousticData, Value=Process(FilterAcoustic) Parameter: Name=Radius, Value=250 #Output: ProcessData
#15 [Process BioStationWeighting] Function: BioStationWeighting Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=WeightingMethod, Value=Equal Parameter: Name=BioticData, Value=Process(FilterBiotic) Parameter: Name=NASC, Value=Process(NASC) Parameter: Name=AcousticData, Value=Process(FilterAcoustic) Parameter: Name=LengthDist, Value= Parameter: Name=Radius, Value= Parameter: Name=LengthInterval, Value=1.0 Parameter: Name=A, Value=20 Parameter: Name=B, Value= Parameter: Name=MaxNumLengthSamples, Value=100 #Output: ProcessData
#16 [Process TotalLengthDist] Function: TotalLengthDist FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=LengthDist, Value=Process(RegroupLengthDist) Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) #Output: LengthDist
#17 [Process Density] Function: Density FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=AcousticData, Value=Process(FilterAcoustic) Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=LengthDist, Value=Process(TotalLengthDist) Parameter: Name=NASC, Value=Process(MeanNASC) Parameter: Name=A, Value=20 Parameter: Name=B, Value=-71.9 Parameter: Name=C, Value=0 #Output: Density
#18 [Process MeanDensity_Stratum] Function: MeanDensity FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=ProcessData, Value=Process(ReadProcessData) Parameter: Name=Densities, Value=Process(Density) Parameter: Name=SampleUnitType, Value=Stratum #Output: Density
#19 [Process SumDensity_Stratum] Function: SumDensity FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=Densities, Value=Process(MeanDensity_Stratum) Parameter: Name=EstLayers, Value=1~PELBOT #Output: Density
#20 [Process AbundanceByLength] Function: AbundanceByLength FileOutput: true Parameter: Name=Densities, Value=Process(SumDensity_Stratum) Parameter: Name=SampleArea, Value=Process(StratumArea) #Output: Abundance
